author: alon.ssv.network
content:
> My concern is that I have to effectively bring my cold wallet out of cold storage to derive my hot validating keys if i ever lost them. This has inherent and unnecessary risk to the user. Having a different recovery mnemonic for cold storage means that I only ever need to access this data in the event that I want to use my withdrawal wallet and prevents a total loss via theft if someone were to gain access to my hot key mnemonic.
<@!399309815517544451> with an hardware wallet this shouldn't be the case, you could derive it internally.
You could use a different derivation branch for withdrawal keys but that will disconnect the withdrawal key from the validation key as it is now.
